title: Streets of India Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Was veg when it opened its doors in 2011 but added meat in summer 2011. Makes authentic Indian street food using herbs and fresh ingredients. The veg dishes are marked with "v" and many are or could be made vegan upon request. Specialties include South Indian dishes like masala dosa and uttapam, as well as curries prepared with soy meats. All-you-can-eat lunch buffet on weekdays. Has Wi-Fi.
